alert.note: Alert for Mono (California) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Flood Advisory issued July 19 at 5:49PM PDT by NWS Reno
info.description: ...FLOOD ADVISORY IN EFFECT UNTIL 715 PM PDT THIS EVENING... * WHAT...Flooding caused by excessive rainfall is expected. * WHERE...A portion of east central California, including the following county, Mono. * WHEN...Until 715 PM PDT. * IMPACTS...Minor flooding in low-lying and poor drainage areas. Some low-water crossings may become impassable. * ADDITIONAL DETAILS... - At 546 PM PDT, Doppler radar indicated heavy rain due to thunderstorms. Minor flooding is ongoing or expected to begin shortly in the advisory area. - Some locations that will experience flooding include... Bodie Road east of Bodie, Bodie Creek east of Bodie, and CA-167 northeast of Mono Lake. - http://www.weather.gov/safety/flood
info.instruction: Turn around, don`t drown when encountering flooded roads. Most flood deaths occur in vehicles.
